text: @GOPChairwoman @realDonaldTrump WTF? You’re joking, right? We’re will end up with a quarter million dead from coronavirus in the next 8-12 months, if not more. Unemployment = 14%. We’re in a recession and likely a depression. The country is on the brink of civil war. Where have you been? Jesus.
